<template>
    <v-card outLined class='ma-3' :class='{ "teal accent-4": messageProp.user == "friend","grey lighten-2": messageProp.user != "friend" }'>
        <v-card-subtitle class='font-weight-bold' >{{messageProp.user=="friend"? nameProp: "me"}}</v-card-subtitle> 
        <!-- :class='{'text-right font-weight-bold':message.user=! "friend" }' -->
        <v-card-text>{{messageProp.text}}</v-card-text>
    </v-card>
</template>

<script>
export default {
    props:['nameProp','messageProp']
